posts.post_text: December 29, 2015 at 1:36 PM#2[color=#66FF00]Assign Remote[/color] (Which remotes - 1=analog, 2=midi, 3=dmx?) /enabled=("Enabled - on or off?")[color=#66FF00]Assign Root[/color] "dmx_protocols"."art-net" /outactive=(Artnet OUT - on or off?)[color=#66FF00]Assign Root[/color] "dmx_protocols"."art-net" /inactive=(Artnet IN - on or off?)[color=#66FF00]Assign DMXUniverse[/color] (what universe?) /dmxinmerge=("Merge - htp or lotp or off?")

title: A few setting macro please
